Index.title: OpenClaw Installation Wizard
Index.description: Follow these steps to quickly get OpenClaw running on your preferred environment.

Landing.hero_desc: OpenClaw is the ultimate open-source framework for deploying and managing autonomous AI agents in any environment.
Landing.demo_desc: Experience the power of OpenClaw in your browser.
Landing.features_desc: Powerful features to help you build, deploy, and scale your AI automation layer with confidence.
Landing.cta_desc: Join 1,000+ developers building the future of autonomous agents with OpenClaw.
Landing.footer: Â© 2026 MyClaw. OpenClaw Community Project. All rights reserved.
Landing.feature_ai_desc: Multi-model support including GPT-4, Claude 3, and Local LLMs.
Landing.feature_secure_desc: End-to-end encryption for all communications and key storage.
Landing.feature_easy_desc: One-click deployment to AWS, VirtualBox, or Bare Metal servers.
Landing.feature_console_desc: Full terminal access directly through your Telegram bot or Dashboard.
Landing.feature_bot_desc: Connect via Telegram, Discord, or Web Chat with ease.
Landing.feature_auto_desc: Schedule tasks and create complex AI workflows without coding.

Environment.title: Select Environment
Environment.desc: Choose where you want to install OpenClaw.

SSH.title: SSH Connection Settings
SSH.desc: Enter the SSH details to connect to your target environment.
SSH.firewall_desc: If using cloud environments like AWS EC2, ensure the following ports are open in your inbound rules:

Keys.title: API Keys Setup
Keys.desc: Enter your AI Provider Key and Telegram Bot Token. These are optional but recommended.
Keys.ai_desc: Used by OpenClaw to power the conversational AI agent.
Keys.tg_desc: Enables the Telegram Bot interface. Create one via @BotFather.

Install.title: Installing OpenClaw...
Install.desc: Please wait while we perform the installation tasks on your server.
Install.desc_success: OpenClaw has been successfully installed in your environment.
Install.in_progress: Installation in progress... do not close this window.
Install.failed: Installation failed. Please check the logs.

Dialog.back_desc: Your entered information might be lost. Do you want to continue?
